title: Distribution of participatory democracy index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem). It combines information on voting rights, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the extent to which citizens can engage in regional and local government, civil society organizations, and direct democracy. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
